# Constants.JsonSourceGeneratorFull field

The converter used internally by LDtkFileFull with JsonSerializer.Deserialize(..., Constants.SerializeOptions) not needed by the user just use .FromFile instead.

```csharp
public static readonly LDtkJsonFullSourceGenerator JsonSourceGeneratorFull;
```
